testcase.name: Using PUP search bar - President Search
testcase.system-out: Given def step0 = 'Using Chrome as a browser' ............................. passed * configure driver = {type:'chromedriver', executable: 'C:/Program Files/Google/Chrome/Application/chromedriver.exe'} . passed And def step1 = 'Browser navigates to PUP search website' ................. passed * driver 'https://www.pup.edu.ph' ......................................... passed And def step2 = 'Maximize Browser' ........................................ passed * maximize() .............................................................. passed And def step3 = 'User click services modal' ............................... passed * click('.services-widget') ............................................... passed And def step4 = 'User click Student button' ............................... passed * click('{^a}Student') .................................................... passed And def step5 = 'Take screenshot' ......................................... passed * driver.screenshot() ..................................................... passed And def step6 = 'Clear input field' ....................................... passed * clear('#txtSearch') ..................................................... passed And def step7 = 'User search for student' ................................. passed * input('#txtSearch', 'student') .......................................... passed And def step8 = 'User click button' ....................................... passed * click("//a[@id='btnSearch']") ........................................... passed And def step9 = 'Wait for the table to load' .............................. passed * waitFor('.table') ....................................................... passed And def step10 = 'Take screenshot' ........................................ passed * driver.screenshot() ..................................................... passed And def step11 = 'Clear Input Field' ...................................... passed * clear('#txtSearch1') .................................................... passed And def step12 = 'User input text search' ................................. passed * input('#txtSearch1', 'MMDA') ............................................ passed When def step13 = 'User click button' ..................................... passed * click('.btn.btn-system.btn-flat') ....................................... passed Then def step14 = 'User expected result should display the output in the table' . passed * match text('.table') contains 'MMDA' .................................... passed * waitUntil("document.readyState == 'complete'") .......................... passed * driver.screenshot() ..................................................... passed
